FuncDef:
The active port-vxlan command activates VXLAN interface licenses for a CM board in batches.
The undo active port-vxlan command deactivates VXLAN interface licenses for a CM board in batches.
By default, VXLAN interface licenses are not activated for a CM board.
CLIs: undo active port-vxlan slot <slotid> card <cardid> [ port <portlist> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interface list of a CM board, with the interfaces separated by commas (,) or hyphens (-).
-

Specifies the slot ID of a CM board.
-

Examples: [*HUAWEI-license] undo active port-vxlan slot 2 card 0 port 0-8
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The VXLAN service can be configured on a CM board only after VXLAN interface licenses are activated for the board.
This command applies only to CM boards on which the VXLAN function is license-specific.
In VS mode, this command applies only to the admin VSand cannot be configured in other VSs.
Prerequisites
The license file on the master main control board has been activated by running the license active command.Interface-specific basic hardware licenses have been activated by running the active port-basic slot card port command.
